languages.text: "Это временно. Я давно заметил — после принятия титула уши через некоторое время сами собой принимают благородные очертания!"
"It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"
languages.original_text: "Это временно. Я давно заметил — после принятия титула уши через некоторое время сами собой принимают благородные очертания!"

traits.locale_text: "It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"
"It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"
"It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"
"It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"
"It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"

languages.text: “不用担心。我不久前就注意到了这件事情：一旦有人获得了头衔，那个人的耳朵自己就会慢慢长成尊贵的形状！”
languages.original_text: "It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"

traits.locale_text: “不用担心。我不久前就注意到了这件事情：一旦有人获得了头衔，那个人的耳朵自己就会慢慢长成尊贵的形状！”

languages.text: «Ya se le pasará. Lo descubrí hace un tiempo: cuando alguien acepta un título, poco a poco, ¡sus orejas adoptan forma de orejas de noble por cuenta propia!».
languages.original_text: "It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"

traits.locale_text: «Ya se le pasará. Lo descubrí hace un tiempo: cuando alguien acepta un título, poco a poco, ¡sus orejas adoptan forma de orejas de noble por cuenta propia!».

languages.text: 「そんなもんだ。少し前に気づいたんだが…高貴な称号を得た人は、耳も徐々に高貴な形になっていくもんらしい！」
languages.original_text: "It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"

traits.locale_text: 「そんなもんだ。少し前に気づいたんだが…高貴な称号を得た人は、耳も徐々に高貴な形になっていくもんらしい！」

languages.text: "Das wird schon. Mir ist schon vor einer Weile aufgefallen, wenn jemand einen Titel erhält, nehmen seine Ohren mit der Zeit ganz von alleine eine adlige Form an!"
languages.original_text: "It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"

traits.locale_text: "Das wird schon. Mir ist schon vor einer Weile aufgefallen, wenn jemand einen Titel erhält, nehmen seine Ohren mit der Zeit ganz von alleine eine adlige Form an!"

languages.text: « Plus pour longtemps. Je m'étais déjà fait la réflexion : une fois qu'une personne accepte un titre, ses oreilles prennent progressivement une forme plus noble, comme par magie ! »
languages.original_text: "It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"

traits.locale_text: « Plus pour longtemps. Je m'étais déjà fait la réflexion : une fois qu'une personne accepte un titre, ses oreilles prennent progressivement une forme plus noble, comme par magie ! »

languages.text: "Düzelir. Bir süre önce fark ettim: Birisi bir mevkiye geldikten sonra kulakları yavaş yavaş kendi kendine soylu bir şekil almaya başlıyor!"
languages.original_text: "It'll pass. I noticed it a while ago — once someone has accepted a title, their ears gradually take on a noble shape all on their own!"

traits.locale_text: "Geçer. Bir süre önce fark ettim: Birisi bir mevkiye geldikten sonra kulakları yavaş yavaş kendi kendine soylu bir şekil almaya başlıyor!"
